snippet: The singer received a “Notice of Intention to Consider Refusal” in response to his visa application as a result of his conviction for assaulting Rihanna in 2009.
abstract: The singer received a “Notice of Intention to Consider Refusal” in response to his visa application as a result of his conviction for assaulting Rihanna in 2009.

headline.main: Chris Brown Cancels Australian and New Zealand Shows After Visa Troubles
headline.print_headline: Visa Issues Prompt Chris Brown to Cancel Concerts
